sentences.en: A testatormake a nuncupative will, which shall be witnessed by two or more witnesses.
sentences.cn: 口头遗嘱应当有两个以上见证人在场见证.

sentences.en: When the emergency situation is over and if the testator is able to make a will in writing or in the form of a sound-recording, the nuncupative will he has made shall be invalidated.
sentences.cn: 危急情况解除后，遗嘱人能够用书面或者录音形式立遗嘱的，所立的口头遗嘱无效。

trans.tran_en: (of a will) declared orally by the testator and later written down
